page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT IN BANBRIDGE
page.content: There is a variety of entertainment in the Banbridge area. Concerts, dances,socials and other entertain- ments are given at local halls in Banbridge and throughout the district. At Huntly Rd. in Banbridge is the Iveagh cinema,a modern building and the only cinema in the area.Occasional live concerts are staged here. Annual entertainment highlights are dramatic or musical plays staged by local schools.The Banbridge Choral Society also contribute a variety of produc- tions throughout the year.Most hotels and licensed premises have regular programmes of cabaret and dancing. Discos and other functions are provided by the Coach Inn,which is the main source of entertainment for the younger generation.
